description: Fresh, zesty and herby, this tabouli salad is delicious on its own with a mezze platter but is also fantastic served as a side with lamb or fish dishes.
keywords: Tabouli,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,High protein,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tabouli Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Lebanese cucumber, halved lengthways, seeds removed
3 roma tomatoes, halved lengthways, seeds removed
1 lemon, rind finely grated (plus 1/4 cup juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Place burghul or quinoa into a small saucepan with 1 cup water and bring to the boil. Remove from heat and stand for 10 minutes. Drain well. When cool enough to handle, squeeze as much liquid as possible from burghul and place into a large bowl.
Finely dice tomatoes and cucumber. Chop spring onion, parsley and mint.
Combine tomatoes, cucumber, spring onion, parsley, mint and lemon rind with burghul. Toss well to combine.
Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper in a jug. Add to salad and toss until combined. Serve with olives and Lebanese bread.
